context_bundle.summary: Commit message conventions: Conventional Commits format - type(scope): subject. Types: feat, fix, docs, style, refactor, test, chore. Subject: imperative mood, lowercase, no period. Body: optional details. Footer: breaking changes, issue refs.

onboarding.quick_start: Commit messages: type(scope): subject. Types: feat (new feature), fix (bug fix), docs (documentation), style (formatting), refactor (code change), test (tests), chore (maintenance). Subject: imperative, lowercase, <50 chars. Example: 'feat(auth): add OAuth2 login'
common_patterns: test: add unit tests for parser
BREAKING CHANGE: footer for breaking changes
